website_summaries.verdict: Others on our list work just as well for pants and skirts and are a better value, those who prefer their design are very satisfied with these unique hangers.
pros: Stands out for their ability to hold heavy pants and skirts without leaving creases
Features nice craftsmanship with solid, cherry-finished wood and chrome swivel hooks
cons: The most costly hangers on our list – you only get 10 for the price, but they also offer exceptional quality
Not long enough for large-sized garments

customer_reviews.title: Totally Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. These clamp and hold slacks and jeans neatly and securely as intended -- BY THE LEG CUFFS -- not the waist band. The small indents allow space for the seams to set which allow for evenly distributed pressure along the length of the wood pieces. These are very well constructed and the wood is well stained and the finish is smooth and holds up well to use without chipping.
customer_reviews.author: VSMO

customer_reviews.title: Great for hanging women's slacks!
customer_reviews.text: These are very sturdy hangers and I anticipate they will last. They are metal with a rubberized coating. We purchased them to hold women's dress slacks which are very thin and many of the hard plastic hangers will not clamp tightly enough to hold the slacks. There is no such issue with these hangers and they superbly do the job for which they were purchased. They clamp tightly and the rubberized coating helps to hold them as well.
customer_reviews.author: Horns2005

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected.  Minor (cosmetic) shipping damage.
customer_reviews.text: Had clearly seen wear and tear in shipping. 2 of the 10 had chips in the wood. 1 had the metal hook very badly bent. Luckily I was able to bend it into workable shape without breaking it. That said, these work as expected. The cloth lining inside the wooden bars provides enough grip for secure hanging. The clip is secure. Excellent way to hang slacks without getting any wrinkles. Even the best standard hangers will leave a horizontal line if hung long enough. These won't. The slacks hang straight down. You'll need enough vertical clearance for them to hang freely.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher S. Cornette

customer_reviews.title: Careful How You Breathe
customer_reviews.text: Although the design is cute, 2/10 would not buy again. Half of the hangers have already broken since my order two months ago. The plastic part holding the metal curved section to the wood slats is incredibly fragile. It breaks when I open the hangers, it breaks when I hang the hangers, it breaks when I do much as breathe too heavily on the hangers. I regret my purchase and would not wish the same on others.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel V

customer_reviews.title: Hangers work well... only for a while
customer_reviews.text: I am changing my review. After a few months, these hangers are breaking. 4 of the 10 are broken now, and I expect the others will too, eventually. The plastic clip that holds the tension between the hanger hook and the wood part wears out fast, and the two sections separate completely.
customer_reviews.author: Super Mom

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I’m sorry to say that these hangers fell apart within 2 days. I purchased one pkg for home and they lasted about a week. I purchased a second pkg for travel, thinking I may have received a lemon. Not so. Guess I’m a slow learner. Do not bother purchasing these hangers. They may be inexpensive but, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: sandra

customer_reviews.title: the plastic (black) breaks very easily
customer_reviews.text: These pant's hanger are similar in design to the one's sold in Ikea however the plastic used appears to have less elasticity in it and it breaks easily. 3 of the 12 that I received broke the first time that I closed the hanger. Another 5 have broken since then leaving me with only 4 left. I made the trek to Ikea to buy theirs for $1 each and that remedied the problem. I would most definitely avoid purchasing this product.
customer_reviews.author: Burt L Zinser

customer_reviews.title: If you need 10 of these, best to buy 20.
customer_reviews.text: Although I love the concept of these hangers, there is a somewhat prevalent design flaw. I've purchased four 10-packs over the years and I seem to get at least 2 or 3 per pack that will not work correctly. When I open a defective one to hang my pants, the black piece (and attached hanging loop) will separate from the metal piece holding the wooden bars and fall off, causing you to have to pick it up and re-seat it to hang your pants. It's a minor inconvenience, but aggravating over time.
customer_reviews.author: GuitarRebel

customer_reviews.title: Good, not Great
customer_reviews.text: The two pieces dont always close together well, sometimes there is a gap. This is due to the hinge not being shaped correctly. Also, the hook on most of them keeps falling off and as they wear it is happening more and more. I wish I could find some where the hook mechanism and hinge is all steel, like they used to be, but I have not seen any of them anymore.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisB

customer_reviews.title: Poor material and don't last
customer_reviews.text: The wood part that clamps on the pants are finished well and are made well. The plastic clip that is used to make the clamp are a weak material and don't last. I've broken several in normal occasional use. I don't recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: MikCVT

customer_reviews.title: Better than the ones I was able to purchase locally.
customer_reviews.text: I like all of my pants/trousers/jeans and even capris to be hung straight from the dryer into this type of hanger as it helps them almost press themselves. As a result, I get almost ironed looking garments without using an iron. This a great benefit when living in a steamy hot climate that makes ironing a misery many months of the year, even with air conditioning. I do carefully choose my cotton garment fabrics for wrinkle resistance. These hangers contribute significantly to my looking neater while spending virtually no time ironing.
customer_reviews.author: CFoster

customer_reviews.title: Great hangers, but sticky.
customer_reviews.text: I love the hangers. They are super sturdy and hold the pants like nothing I've ever seen before. The only problem I am having when them is the rubber is sticky. I've got a couple other hangers made identically to this with a different color rubber and it is not sticky. That is the only reason I gave this product a 4 star rating instead of a 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Duane

customer_reviews.title: Plastic clip broke
customer_reviews.text: I was happily using them for a while. However the plastic hook that is used like open-close mechanism is not sturdy and breaks easily. I have four broken hangers now.
customer_reviews.author: Traveling Wilbery

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product - does the job correctly
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! Best for business clothes- pants, skirts, dresses. I travel with them. Purchased twice. Highly recommended - this is not a sponsored endorsement. For thin fabrics must fold over to increase width. Sturdy product and hook will fold and detach for travel or storage.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Broken already.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these in January, 2017. They're beautiful but one of them falls apart easily and another has broken already. And the pants hangers here don't get much use. The black, plastic part broke so I wonder if this will happen to more of them eventually. Sad because they look so nice. October 2017: All but 2 have broken. Very disappointed as they don't get used on a regular basis. And because pant hangers should last for years in my experience. These were a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Shoulda bought these years ago.  Great closet space savers.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. They hold my jeans and trousers, cuffed or otherwise, nice and steady. Using these gave me more room in my closet as no need anymore to fold my pants over regular hangers. Two pairs of pants on these hangars takes up the same amount of horizontal closet space as one pair on standard hangers. Of course, more space is required vertically, but that wasn't my problem. Another benefit I've noticed is that wrinkles tend to smooth out better on these than standard hangars. Gonna buy some more for family members.
customer_reviews.author: Vincenzo

customer_reviews.title: Again you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this is not what I thought it was I don’t know how to explain it but the hawk that goes on to the railing keeps coming off of the pants for ACK so every time you use it you have to play with it to get it on properly to hold the pants probably I should say
customer_reviews.author: Rob H

customer_reviews.title: Good Hanger, But Not 11.5" Long
customer_reviews.text: This is a good pant hanger. It is hard to find a pant hanger anymore with the felt liner. However, the advertised length is 11.5", but they are only 9.75" long. I have bought this brand in the past with the black metal instead of the chrome look and they were the full 11.5". I will keep them for my full length pants (and my wife's) but I will use my other 11.5" for my wide gold shorts.
customer_reviews.author: kenepp1

customer_reviews.title: NOT AS DESCRIBED.
customer_reviews.text: I bought several of these because the description bullet point states: full width grooves....which is why I paid up and bought these particular trouser hangers. The grooved hangers hold trousers much more firmly than those with smooth or fabric covered faces. THESE HANGERS ARE NOT GROOVED. The faces are covered with some sort of cheap material. I am extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Skagway

customer_reviews.title: Taking me back to the old days!!!
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are great and they remind me of when my dad used these for his pants and my mom for her skirts. They have a very nice grip to hold them up and keep them straight. I can understand why my parents used them...to keep the creases out of their pants and skirts and they work very well. I have suit skirts and dress pants that i use these hanger for and they work very well. I am glad i decided to purchase these. I made a very good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal SamplerTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: The hooks fall off
customer_reviews.text: Well, they work but the hooks are held on by a loose-fitting plastic bracket and they ALWAYS fall off the wire. Pain in the ass to reassemble EVERY time. Avoid!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mishka

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Buy for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Like these better than the similar hangers I bought at a "Hammock, Shower, & Out there" store. My older hangers bought at the store had nothing to keep the clothes from slipping out after clamped. It was smooth wood. These hangers have a rubber pad on the inside of the slats that eliminate the slipping of the clothes.
customer_reviews.author: HighHeelGurl

customer_reviews.title: I expected a little more
customer_reviews.text: These hangers started out really nicely, but lost their holding power quickly. A pant is not very heavy. The material used on the inside of the wood holders is not very thick. I continue to use them but only after gluing hook and loop material over the factory stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Breed

customer_reviews.title: Works great for men’s Bermuda shorts.
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t use these for years. But living in Florida I have many pairs of Bermuda shorts. These hangers are absolutely great for Shorts I will order more.
customer_reviews.author: Fontaine Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As good as any other pack I've purchased
customer_reviews.text: These are as good as any other pants hangers, of the same design, I have bought in the past. If using for multiple or thick garments, or after a lot of use opening and closing I imagine that they would stretch on the stress points and break there, too. Glad it was a big pack.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, easy to use, and very functional.
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are easy to use and excellent quality. They keep pants pressed and tidy so they are ready to wear. As you can see on the photos, they are made from wood and metal with strips to protect your clothing and keep your pants perfectly pressed and ready to wear. I tested them on dress pants, jeans, and corduroys and they work well for each type. They are a good value for 10 hangers and a good investment because you can use them for years to come. Don't hesitate to buy these hangers!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Flores

customer_reviews.title: Over and over again!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I've bought these, so I finally got smart and ordered two sets. Now my closet has diminished in capacity but Golly Gee do my skirts look pretty hanging up! They do take up a lot of space on the rod, BUT, they are well made and attractive. I like how they match my wood hangers, very stylish. They're durable, able to grab things well. I do have issues with some of my skirts slipping out of these. I'm not keen on clasping the skirt under the waste waistband. But that's two out of more than I'm going to confess.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Good but has flaw..
customer_reviews.text: They work very well once you first get them but the plastic is elastic and will stretch in the future so some of my pants are sliding off the hanger, and when i open my closet, i wake up with a surprise of pant on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: micki

customer_reviews.title: Five stars no more
customer_reviews.text: Excellent hangars. Very solid and slim, no weird odors or anything like that. I plan on ordering more. **Edit: Well, it's been a year and these haven't held up well at all. All of my pants slip down over time, the hanger part often falls off and I've had several break at the plastic part just during routine use. Glad I never bought more.
customer_reviews.author: beedle

customer_reviews.title: Defective.  Plastic connector breaks with light use.
customer_reviews.text: Defective product. Lost half the hangers in under six months because of the flimsy plastic piece. Would have been great if the plastic weren't so cheap. Even trying to be very careful, it snaps easily.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper7112177

customer_reviews.title: The plastic neck breaks very easily
customer_reviews.text: Almost all of the plastic necks on these have broken, rarely had that happen with other brands. Half of them are broken and have only had them a couple of months. Dissatisfied, waste of money, sorry.
customer_reviews.author: gene

customer_reviews.title: Like the kids card game “52 pickup”?
customer_reviews.text: The hanger portion separates from the clamp every time all the time. Always have to locate the hanger part on the floor and put back together to hang my pants. Every time. Went to IKEA and got cheap ones that stay assembled and easily work. Every time. AVOID these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy these! You'll have to replace them.
customer_reviews.text: These were great when I first purchased the. I have had them a couple months and the hangers are literally breaking while hanging in my closet. The plastic fitting that holds the hanger closed is really brittle and breaks when closing the hanger, even with one pair of thin pants. I have 2 left and the rest broke just hanging in the closet.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor H.

customer_reviews.title: Hooks fall out when opening unless you're careful.
customer_reviews.text: I knew about the issue with these because I have bought them before and I still got them. They match the wooden shirt hangers I use in my closet. There are only two things I would change. 1. Black hooks 2. Make the part where the hook attaches to the rest of the hanger a tighter fit so it doesn't fall off nearly every time I hang something on it.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus

customer_reviews.title: plastic part of hook breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two sets and in one of the sets the hook plastic hook was broken before I even opened the package. Of the 24 that were ordered, I might still have ten left.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: I returned them solely because you can’t stack the hangers. I have a lot of jeans and pants but a small closet, so I need a hook on each hanger so that I can stack/cascade three pants on one hook.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Break Easily...... Cheap
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for about 6 months now. In that time, 4 our of the 10 hanger clips have broken off. I was very disappointed, as I had originally liked these hangers. They looked very nice, but unfortunately they do not hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Boda

customer_reviews.title: Rough around the Edges.
customer_reviews.text: Look just like t to he hangars we have always used and work great. However before hanging anything we had to sand off the rough edges to avoid snagging clothes. These are well made, but sloppy workmanship.
customer_reviews.author: H2OLvr

customer_reviews.title: So Large!
customer_reviews.text: What I didn't realize was, this hanger is very long, so it was too large to fit in with other pants/skirts hangers. There should be an 8 " or 10: wide hanger which would fit more efficiently with other clothes hangers. These 12.5" hangers stuck way behind and in front of others. Otherwise, the hangers are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: carol barney

customer_reviews.title: which I like, so I decided to get these too
customer_reviews.text: I have the matching shirt hangers, which I like, so I decided to get these too. They are not durable (at least one cracked in the center) and don't hold things very well. My skirts droop on the sides because the pressure isn't even across the wood.
customer_reviews.author: VioletK

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight & Elegant wooden hangers
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are lightweight and yet are sturdy. The walnut finish on these hangers gives it an elegant look. I have been using these for about 3 weeks now to hang my skirts & husband's pants and so far we haven't had any problems with them. If you are in the market for wooden hangers which are not bulky then I think these hangers are the best option. You can't beat the price too.
customer_reviews.author: Zssav

customer_reviews.title: In hindsight i prefer the clip type pant hangars
customer_reviews.text: I guess these work as advertised, but they way they open and close they dont feel like they will last long. I prefer the pant hangers with the clips at the end. Updated 06/24/17. As suspected the plastic fulcrum that opens and closes the hangars are too flimsy and break easily. At least a quarter of the otherwise nice hangars are worthless because of a small cheap part. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: ECG from the ICT

customer_reviews.title: Hold Tight
customer_reviews.text: These line up nicely, don’t take a lot of space, and grip well. Maybe a little too well- they are a bit hard to open and on some items, leave a mark.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Crocodile

customer_reviews.title: didnt work for me
customer_reviews.text: does not hold the pants. Also marks them where it clips on. Pants are always sliding out or hanging askew
customer_reviews.author: Walter106

customer_reviews.title: They break quickly. Manufacturer ignores you.
customer_reviews.text: At first I liked them but over the last 2 years I have had 5 of them break in the same manner. The plastic part of the hook breaks off. The first one was within a couple weeks and I assumed it was a fluke. Now I wish I would have returned them. 2/8/19 Update: They are all broken now. I tried contacting the manufacturer and they didn’t respond.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Stublaski

customer_reviews.title: After use the hook becomes loose and falls off.
customer_reviews.text: While I liked these initially - after several months use, I now hate them!!! The hook is not permanently attached to the hanger and every time one opens the hanger, the hook falls off!!!! It is such a pain to have to stop what I am doing and retrieve the hook from where it has been flung. Dumb.
customer_reviews.author: sloaf

customer_reviews.title: they work
customer_reviews.text: have tried other hangers like these in the past. They broke or the clothes slipped off. These are great! They hold the clothes, don't wrinkle them and so far, seem pretty sturdy. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Hangers that hang things
customer_reviews.text: Classic hangers, love them. The wood stain color is even and consistent and they were packaged safely for delivery. No issues with the plastic part snapping or breaking apart. Over time I know this will become more of an issue, my best suggestion is to use these very carefully as to not stress the plastic piece so much. I ordered these as a replacement for similar hangers that had the plastic piece break away after about 2 years of use. The pressure points of where these clamp down do cause some wrinkling and lines in your slacks. I haven't quite figured out how to position my slacks without causing some kind of indentation.
customer_reviews.author: bad

customer_reviews.title: Return shipping should be more cost effective
customer_reviews.text: Problem was after deciding they were too wide for closet I returned them, but it cost me 11.00 for return label which I only received one and then I had to pay 5 dollars to have box made so they could all be returned with one shipping label. It would have been more cost effective to keep them
customer_reviews.author: colleen

customer_reviews.title: I bought these in 2016 and love them. Unlike other reviewers we have not had ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in 2016 and love them. Unlike other reviewers we have not had any break nor have we had problems with them not holding clothing securely. The white felt lining keeps pants and skirts from slipping unlike our previous hangers that did not have the lining.
customer_reviews.author: Always Reading

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but jeans fell off immediately
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to hang all my jeans in my closet and sadly after hanging them all my jeans were on the floor. The clamp doesn't close enough to hold the weight of the jeans, so I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Be Careful!
customer_reviews.text: Two of the hangers arrived damaged. Harder to use than expected - I wouldn’t purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Ansley

customer_reviews.title: The felt is s nice touch and makes up for a little warpage in ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything arrived intact. The shipment was packed securely. The felt is s nice touch and makes up for a little warpage in some of the hangers. None of my slacks slipped out of the hangers , fell on the ground. Very pleased , I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: SVDAVE

customer_reviews.title: Breakage-prone
customer_reviews.text: Many of the hangers broke within a few years. I am only hanging wool trousers and khakis with them, but the hook snaps off in the same spot.
customer_reviews.author: Driftin’ Blues

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: The covering on these has a tacky (sticky) feel that I didn't like. Although I am sure it keeps clothes from slipping out I didnt like it and returned them.
customer_reviews.author: A Miller

customer_reviews.title: do not hold slacks tight enough
customer_reviews.text: these do not work well for my dress slacks. they do not hold the pants tight enough so they end up falling down. pretty frustrating. they do look and feel nice though! i suppose of the material on my pants was thicker these would work well.
customer_reviews.author: AJS4

customer_reviews.title: Never again
customer_reviews.text: Used similar ones in Europe with rubber grips....these have felt and lousy holding strength
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with the quality of the hook mechanism for these pants hangers. After 4 months 5 of the mechanisms have broken. I was shocked when the first one broke and thought it was a fluke but over time 4 more have broken. Avoid this style. The wood is good quality and finish is very good but mechanicals are poor.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: The price is so very reasonable
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly what I've been looking for. I originally bought some from Target but I tried to buy more and they discontinued them. However, I found these and I love them. I love the non-slip felt that keeps my pants & skirts from slipping off unlike the Taget hangers. So now I've got to buy non slip felt for those. I will be ordering another order soon. I love these hangers & perfect for organizing my clothes
customer_reviews.author: ChicagoChick54

customer_reviews.title: Happy with slack hangers
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with my hangers. They grip my pants by the leg bottoms just fine. They are attractive in my closet. I have more room, in spite of the hanger size, because my pants aren't doubled over a hanger, and there is no crease in my pants when I go to wear them. The clip seems sturdy. I've only had them a couple of months, so I don't know about long term lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Mom1Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a quality set of hangers
customer_reviews.text: I was honestly surprised by the quality of these hangers. They are well made and the hanger clamps are nice and tight so you won't have any worries about anything falling. In the closet, they look a whole lot nicer than my normal plastic hangers, so am very pleased with the purchase. If you're looking for some solid hangers, look no further.
customer_reviews.author: 10S4me

customer_reviews.title: STURDY~DURABLE~Easy to use~Items do NOT slip off hangers!
customer_reviews.text: I use these to hang homemade table runners on~~They are sturdy and things don't slide off easily!!~GREAT product!!! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Idea is fine but the plastic fails quickly
customer_reviews.text: Did not last the plastic hinge broke on all of them
customer_reviews.author: Marcia F.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap hangers.The bottom of hooks have broken on half of these hangers The ends of the hooks are cheap rubber. This happens on hangers with only one pair of pants.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Kenney

customer_reviews.title: The arms/cross-members bend too easily
customer_reviews.text: I really like the rubberized/coated arms (or cross-members) on these hangers, but they seem to be made of very soft metal and seem to bend much too easily.
customer_reviews.author: John & Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Mostly What I expected
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars as the length is 2" shorter than once I bought a few years ago, same style. Seem to work as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Joe and Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.  Simply amazing.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't even know these existed, and now I know. These are retardedly amazing. Those two-clip hangers at the clothing stores you grab for free? Pfft. Useless. For the time and effort spent fumbling around trying to hang stuff up with those, you've already got 2 or 3 pants hung up with these. Laundry time just got a little less of a pain in the rectum.
customer_reviews.author: MellowJello

customer_reviews.title: Work very well
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. These work much better than the plastic ones which had been used. They hold the clothing much better, largely due to the cloth pad on the inner side of the wood. They accommodate skirts, shorts, jeans, and dress slacks. Most pleased to have found them.
customer_reviews.author: adggjs

customer_reviews.title: i really liked these hangers but the hooks are starting to break
customer_reviews.text: Updating rating: Since no one can answer or asstist me on this matter. i really liked these hangers but the hooks are starting to break. Is there a way I can get just hooks?
customer_reviews.author: DEBBiE...B

customer_reviews.title: They do exactly what they are supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: As the title says, they do exactly what they are supposed to do, Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Cal

customer_reviews.title: exceeded my expectations by a large margin!
customer_reviews.text: The apparent quality of materials and how put together was outstanding. Although not very important, the hangers were packed so beautifully. There was no way they were going to even scratch in shipping. When I opened the box it looked like a work of art.
customer_reviews.author: Hans Weidig Jr

customer_reviews.title: Quality control issue
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I received 2 hangers without the portion you hang on the rod! They look great but obviously the quality control is not good in the shopping department.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Rimmer

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is not a complicated product and it is made as well as should be expected. Can be recommended.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: I love these
customer_reviews.text: Just ordered my second batch of these to add more slacks to my closet. These are great for work pants (slacks and casual docker-type pants.) I also use them to steam my clothes for work as they hold the pants nicely while I steam them.
customer_reviews.author: Sport

customer_reviews.title: Hangin' Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, exactly as pictured and makes hanging my skirts much easier! The grip does not wrinkle them but holds them well - I would not say they can hold a great deal of weight if you are trying to hang something very heavy, but I have no had a problem. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Maeve

customer_reviews.title: Product is of high quality
customer_reviews.text: great product, perfect for hanging stuff without dealing with the hanger too much.....
customer_reviews.author: Da Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Thses hangers hold clothes really well.
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are sturdy, hold my pants securely. They are a little difficult to open.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They Hang Your Pants
customer_reviews.text: I like these hangers a lot. My pants don’t slip out when hung and there is no marks or indentations on the pants when I go to wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great Hangers
customer_reviews.text: I love the way I can keep my slacks and pants wrinkle-free as they hang in the closet
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Get organized....buy these!
customer_reviews.text: I hang my slacks 2-pair to a hanger by the cuffs. Closet full of these. Great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the look and how easy they are to manipulate
customer_reviews.text: I expected these to have more grasp on them. I love the look and how easy they are to manipulate. However, I put my work khakis on these to prevent wrinkles and save room in my dresser. Sometimes my pants just fall out of the grip. I often have to try to get it gripped by the hanger 3 or 4 times before it holds my pants.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Mecum

customer_reviews.title: Bad Product
customer_reviews.text: These might be the best looking, most useless pants hangers ever made. The PLASTIC hinge keeps falling off! Nicer, smooth pants slide out of the hangers. Sorry I bought these.
customer_reviews.author: porter01

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, sturdy slack hangers
customer_reviews.text: These are great hangers for slacks. My husband is quite happy with them. In case I am not the only noob in the world, you do have to clamp them above the bottom seam when you hang the slacks from the bottom of the legs. I did not know that. :)
customer_reviews.author: MLC

customer_reviews.title: They work fine so far.
customer_reviews.text: These hangers work fine and appear likely to work into the future. I have used similar hangers that have had a problem with the plastic clip but it doesn't start to happen until the hangers are several years old so I will reserve final judgement until I have used the hangers for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: They don't slip, easy to handle, solid grip. Old hands can work the clamp.
customer_reviews.text: They're light and strong, take up little hanging space. Use them for heavy work pants and casual pants.
customer_reviews.author: Pub Dude

customer_reviews.title: Bad mechanical hook quality
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing. The reviews looked good, but the mechanical hook mechanism on my entire batch are so loose that they come undone once you open the hangers. (They plastic to motel clip isn’t tight enough; it falls off). The wooden parts are nice and of good quality, but if the hanger is broken then they quality is worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Wong

customer_reviews.title: Good quality non slip hangers
customer_reviews.text: These are good looking hangers that are well made. They will last many years.
customer_reviews.author: GAL

customer_reviews.title: Nice product with one weak spot.
customer_reviews.text: I wish they did not use plastic in the locking device. They eventually break.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Winkle

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: These are nice looking well made hangers. I have been using these for a few weeks and the hinge mechanism works perfectly to hold men's pants. The finish on the wood is smooth and very high quality. So, this is a good looking product that works perfectly for a very fair price.
customer_reviews.author: I Teach Typing

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Well sanded, stain is even, and they work great! I have purchased others before that were poorly sanded and snagged on clothes. These do not.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Best pants hangers I have come across in while.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, easy to use. It's my second buy replacing other brands that have either broken or left their colors on the pant cuffs.
customer_reviews.author: Putterflutters

customer_reviews.title: Best hangers ever
customer_reviews.text: Love these hangers, they grip super well and take up less space than the wood kind
customer_reviews.author: Jason Shutts

customer_reviews.title: nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We bought another brand and they broke easily. so far these have been durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Shipping and packaging perfect - These are very nice and do a good job as the mechanism seems strong and serviceable - I only gave them 4 stars because others that I have had for years have a cork liner where they contact the garment while these have a very thin synthetic tulle or crinoline type material loosely glued to the inner surface. The manufacturer could have put a little more effort and thought into this feature.
customer_reviews.author: Paul H.

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, but two broken in box and really flimsy - two more broke when using with thin silk pants.
customer_reviews.author: s

customer_reviews.title: Great hangers!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are high quality hangers. Thanks to the nice design (shown in the video), they are very easy to use. I wonder if they offer the same type of hangers but a bit longer because some of the pants/skirts are long and soft. If they do, please let me know.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Break easily
customer_reviews.text: These were not good quality hangers. So far at least 4 have broken. Very frustrating as they were a bit pricey. I would not buy again and I would return them if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Momof4

customer_reviews.title: Thin, Sturdy. Love em!
customer_reviews.text: Love them because they are sturdy and thinner than wood. Allows for more hangers.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great hangers made of great designs
customer_reviews.text: Great hangers made of great designs. I love the wooden materials, which are classic, solid and healthy. The color the picture showed is precise and the hanger size is just right. Moreover, it is very easy to be used for all kinds of my pants. I am done with using one hanger for one pant just in seconds. This purchase experience is definitely a right decision.
customer_reviews.author: kerryma

customer_reviews.title: Love these Hangers
customer_reviews.text: These are really good hangers - they are thinner than ones I previously had so I can fit more hangers in my closet, and they are pretty strong. Hope they get more in stock as I would like to order more of them.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

product_meta.title: JS HANGER Wood Pants Hangers, 12 Pack Non Slip Wood Skirt Hangers, Smooth Finish Wood Jeans/Slack Hanger with 360° Swivel Hook, Cherry Finish
feature_bullets: Sturdy and durable for use - 12 pack of premium trouser and skirt hangers. Crafted from 100% solid wood with glossy cherry finish, sturdy and durable for long time use
Space saving design - Dimensions-9.8"x7.1"x0.9", slim space-efficient design keeps clothes in natural shape and maximizes storage space
Full-width gripping design - Unlike hangers with clips, this wooden pant hanger with non slip lining won't leave creases on the waist band of your skirts or pants
Flexible and useful hook - 360 degree chrome plated rust resistant swivel hook, easy and convenient to use, suitable for standard rod

Some using notes - Clamp unlocks and releases bars by pulling hook back, allowing them to open wide for easy placement of clothing; Hangers lock when hook is pulled forward. You'd better don't hang wet clothes; The maximum thickness that can hold is 0.59''; If you hang some thick clothes, please don't hang thinner clothes later; Please use the hanger correctly referring to the picture of application step

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars1,311 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
